        public void nextGenDyn()
        Method uses two methods to run the game. One controls the ArrayLists, one controls the drawing methods.

        public void timerMethod()
        Method is used as timer for the Game. Commented code is old code.

      • onClear

        public void onClear()
        Method used for Clear button. Clears all living cells.

      • onStop

        public void onStop()
        Method used for Start/Stop button. Stops the timer for Game of Life.

      • onStart

        public void onStart()
        Method used for Start/Stop button. Starts the timer for Game of Life.

      • createPattern

                   throws java.lang.Exception

      • onReadURLFile

        public void onReadURLFile()
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Method is used to open a .rle file. Uses methods from FileHandler to read and draw a file to the DynamicGameBoard

        java.lang.Exception - Throws any exceptions.
